name: VillAce
description:
Created during the global Game Jam 2019 : https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/villace

This game is a gestion game who talk about Asexuality representation.

You play a personage who was part of LBGTQIA+ community and try to accept his own sexuality orientation.

You have to choose where to go and each place impact some stats of your personage.

For me the home was the place where we can feel good and where we were accepted like we are.
For me it’s the community and Allies I have made by Coming out.
